Wait, the user specified that if the agent returns "not_found" but there are more items, I should continue with the same cursor. So I need to loop until the status is "cursor_complete" or the answer is found. Also, I have to check previous evidence in case the answer is in a previous portion.

I should also be careful about different dialogue formats. The user mentioned looking for "Name: Text", "Name said, "Text"", or paragraphs starting with dashes where context implies different speakers. So the filter should capture all these variations.

Let me start by creating the cursor with the filterDescription set to "All paragraphs" to cover all possible dialogue formats.
